https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/csCskEeh8mQxsJsuL48U8WWTCqD.jpg In the wake of his big brother’s violent death, 13-year-old Dayveon struggles to find his way in an economically depressed Arkansas town. With no parents and few role models around, Dayveon is soon torn between the lure of a local gang and the friendship of his sister’s boyfriend. Dayveon
